H0.text: Washing hands before each meal helps protect the environment.

H1.text: Doing a science project about energy is the best way to help protect the environment.

H2.text: Ride a bike to school instead of riding in a car is the best way to help protect the environment.

H3.text: Packing a lunch instead of buying a school lunch is the best way to help protect the environment.

A4.text: Cycling also offers a reduced consumption of fossil fuels, less air and noise pollution, reduced greenhouse gas emissions, and greatly reduced traffic congestion.
